lighthouse package¶

Submodules¶

lighthouse.bot module¶

class lighthouse.bot.Bot[source]¶

Bases: object

Bot is the base unit of work This class allows for parser interaction between slack messages and underlying commands that they execute.

Current supported systems: Check MK

valid_slack_bot()[source]¶

Private funciton to check for bot id. Dictates if Bot object is valid

lighthouse.command module¶

class lighthouse.command.Command[source]¶

Bases: object

Takes commands and calls correct sub parsers

handle_command(command='help')[source]¶

Entry point to commands

safe_call(function, *args)[source]¶

Safe call allows for command bases to ensure that the call they make will not return an error.

This also allows for handling of csv or json results

lighthouse.event module¶

class lighthouse.event.Event(bot)[source]¶

Bases: object

Event calls MasterControlProgram as the entry point. MCP handles parsing, calling, and sub params. View MCP for further details

lighthouse.master_control_program module¶

class lighthouse.master_control_program.MasterControlProgram[source]¶

Bases: lighthouse.command.Command

handle_user_command(user, command='help')[source]¶

MCP handles user naming. Takes other commands and passes them to the correct Command controller appends results and returns.

All other functionality is handled by Command’s handle_command method
